allow:
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ powershell -Command "
$file = ''D:/Orbix/blackholeglow/app/src/main/java/com/secret/blackholeglow/MeteorExplosion.java''
$content = Get-Content $file -Raw
# Arreglar comentarios con caracteres especiales
$content = $content -replace ''del original \(M.*OS\)'', ''del original (mas pequenos)''
$content = $content -replace ''Se reducen m.*s r.*pido'', ''Se reducen mas rapido''
Set-Content $file -Value $content -Encoding UTF8
")
